profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-04-06 17:44:15 -0400.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The Archives of American art does not own the original papers. Use is limited to the microfilm copy.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Resumes, a bibliography; legal documents including a lease, a voter registration card and a file on a lawsuit Higgins was involved in; correspondence, 1912-1975, with Robert Macbeth and Inslee Hopper; financial records; clippings and articles about Higgins; exhibition announcements and catalogs; loan agreements for an exhibition of Higgins' work at the Indianapolis Museum of Art, 1976; photographs, including two pages from an album, mostly of Higgins and family members; and reproductions of Higgins' paintings.

altformavail.head: Existence and Location of Copies
altformavail.p: 35mm microfilm reel 3182 available for use only at Museum of Fine Arts, Houston; and through interlibrary loan.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals
originalsloc.p: Originals in: the Museum of Fine Arts, Museum of New Mexico.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Painter; Taos, New Mexico. Born Shelbyville, Indiana.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Microfilmed as part of the Archives of American Art's Texas project.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Lent for microfilming 1984 by the Museum of Fine Arts, Museum of New Mexico.
